verses.verse: <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> a <S%H4522>tribute<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> and on the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

All the <S%H4639>acts<s%> of his <S%H8633>power<s%> and of his <S%H1369>might,<s%> and the full <S%H6575>account<s%> of the <S%H1420>greatness<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> to which the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1431>advanced<s%> <S%H3789>him,<s%> aren't they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia?<s%>

For <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> was <S%H4932>next<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> and <S%H7521>accepted<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H1875>seeking<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to all his <S%H2233>descendants.<s%>
